DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect stress reduction program quality life ovarian cancer patient primary adjuvant chemotherapy .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must initial diagnosis ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer complete primary ovarian cancer surgery 3 cycle neoadjuvant chemotherapy interval cytoreductive surgery ( ICS ) . Final pathology diagnosis stage IIV ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer plan receive primary adjuvant chemotherapy completion chemotherapy ICS . Receive chemotherapy University WisconsinMadison . Subjects must least 18 year age . Englishspeaking Subjects must able use audio medium , read understand study manual . ECOG performance status 02 . Subjects must phone . Subjects participate meditation practice 1 hour per week prior surgery and/or chemotherapy administration . Subjects recurrent ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer . Subjects diagnosis Chronic Fatigue Syndrome ( CFS ) . Subjects unable use audio medium due auditory dysfunction . Subjects unable read write English . Subjects prisoner incarcerate .
